H0.text: Where in London were the first escalators installed in 1898. Selfridges

H1.text: Where in London were the first escalators installed in 1898. Liberty London

H2.text: Where in London were the first escalators installed in 1898. Peter Jones

H3.text: Where in London were the first escalators installed in 1898. Harrods

A4.text: Piat installed its 'stepless' escalator in Harrods Knightsbridge store, which was unveiled on Wednesday, November 16, 1898
